man o man ..u r pissed.. but one thing is sure..this one is a great copy..if i would say v=20,a=20 that wouldn't be wrong..thanks..+1 ..much better than all other large sized uploads.

Not really, I just follow 'quid pro quo' by letter or as my father taught me few decades ago: "If somebody treat you bad, bad is what you should give back".

You have seen how I treat good, civilized people. I don't know, really don't Why in hell people jump out of anonymity Internet provides by - being evil, stupid instead of - been better than they are in any other venue of their life.

Seeing morons who spread their insanity all over I simply wont tolerate some judgment coming from total strangers.

Asking total strangers for guidance and advice is most stupid thing anyone can do.
i agree with you..Sometimes people annoys u more than one can handle..

"Rubbish, so typicall for rookies who knows shit. My encode, especially THIS one, is BETTER or equal to ANY other encode of the SAME title. I KNOW - because I have downloaded and watched ALL current Prometheus encodes out there."

Man! Where does this come from? I try to complement you on your effort, by using expressions like "Great" and "keep it up" and you reply with "moronic", "rubbish", "shit" and "fuck".

I guess it pays to be nice;-). You are right I don't know who you are and you don't know who I am, and i am no rookie. But that doesn't seem to stop you from calling names.

I didn't judge your title compared to the other Prometheus uploads, since these change daily. but to other titles I have seen. And both the audio and video are not the best, especially at the openning scene - to be expected given the size. 

BTW the best is 10/10, not 20/20 as you may wish.

OK, here is something repeated many times:

Some man, you have never seen before walk straight in your home, right to your dinner table, fill the plate, ate food you bought and your wife cooked and after he has finished, tells

"Thanks for the meal, but your cooking is so-so,  mediocre at best, I ate better ones in top restaurants "

"But" - house owner said - "you wasn't invited, you eat it all anyway, and you look like a street bum or hobo and are these "top restaurants" in Paris maybe?"

"Watch your mouth mister! I do not allow to be called hobo. I am very smart, slick and rich." - told street-bum, obviously disturbed.

He left, but...

He came over next day to take a dump on a porch.

"I am very, very nice man. You should stop treating people bad." - he left a message aside the load of shit.

Do not take me wrong but - do you think how asking for Request right here and right now is - appropriate?

Reading and answering and dealing with idiots made me meek and warm, right?
@ twentyforty haha u made my day with the hobo food mumbojumbo, thanks for the torrent!
